originalText.text: My day was smoothe. Perfect weather perfect location and a huge quick success. I loved it.  Less drama and choas just right to pt. Married at my dream location since teenage years.  Love u all and lived the perfect fall day.

text.text: My day was smoothe. Perfect weather perfect location and a huge quick success. I loved it.  Less drama and choas just right to pt. Married at my dream location since teenage years.  Love u all and lived the perfect fall day.

originalText.text: Eric was amazing and made our day very special.  My husband and I eloped during Pride weekend and went to the ceremony not knowing what to expect.  To say that we did not have butterflies in our stomach would be a lie.  Eric was a true professional from start to finish even when I started crying while reciting our vows.  We totally recommend I Do Drive Thru Weddings if you are looking to get married without all the hoopla of a large wedding.

text.text: Eric was amazing and made our day very special.  My husband and I eloped during Pride weekend and went to the ceremony not knowing what to expect.  To say that we did not have butterflies in our stomach would be a lie.  Eric was a true professional from start to finish even when I started crying while reciting our vows.  We totally recommend I Do Drive Thru Weddings if you are looking to get married without all the hoopla of a large wedding.

originalText.text: Where do I begin? Eric was truly a pleasure to work with. He was very accommodating and went above and beyond with helping us get our marriage done in a very short period of time (as well as including a pleasant surprise at the ceremony). Eric was very flexible and offered many suggestions and was very supportive as we had a few periods of indecisiveness. We both absolutely recommend I Do Drive Thru (especially Eric) for all of your marriage needs. 5 Stars, A+! He even helped incorporate our Husky! We will be recommending to all of our friends and family !

originalText.text: Eric performed our wedding ceremony last February and I couldn't say better things about him! He was there every step of the way with us and answered any questions we had! He even tied my husband's bowtie for him before the ceremony! We 100% recommend Eric & I Do Drive Thru weddings for anybody that is looking for a professional, yet fun wedding officiant. ðŸ™‚

originalText.text: It was a great idea.  But the execution was not.  Didn't end up happening, and a simple phone call or email could have helped.  After we waited all day with no show their response is set another date, and we never had this problem in NYC.  Well our special day had a certain date, and was a problem.
